1377:2: lajjā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena|
1377:4: etena svabhāvasahāyālambanakarmasaṃpadā caturvidhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bodhisattvalajjāyāḥ saṃdarśitaṃ|
1377:21: hīnāśayā samānā hīnā hi tadanyathā tvadhikā||3||
1377:24: ataḥ paraṃ caturbhistribhiśca ślokairyathākramaṃ lajjāvipakṣe lajjāyāṃ ca doṣaguṇabhedaṃ darśayati|
1377:27: ityatra ātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābādhāyobhayavyābādhāya ceti saṃdarśitam|
1377:46: ityanena tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata iti saṃdarśitam|
1377:47: ete sarve doṣā hīmatsu bhavanti no jinasuteṣu|
1377:50: deveṣu ca manujeṣu ca nityaṃ saṃjāyate ca budhaḥ||8||
1377:52: saṃbhārāṃśca sa bodheḥ kṣipraṃ pūrayati lajjayā dhīmān|
1377:54: sattvānāṃ pācanayā na khidyate caiva jinaputraḥ||9||
1377:60: iti yathoktadoṣābhāvaṃ guṇayogaṃ ca prāpnotīti saṃdarśitam|
1377:66: ākāśamiva na lipto hrīyukto jinasuto bhavati dharmaiḥ|
1377:80: etena caturvidhaṃ hrīkṛtaṃ liṅgaṃ hīmato darśayati|
1377:89: vīryaṃ samādhiḥ prajñā ca sattvaṃ dhairyaṃ dhṛtirmatā|
1377:97: sarvakāryeṣu hi līnacittatayā vā bhayamutpadyate tadanutsāhataḥ|
1377:102: prakṛtyā praṇidhāne ca nirapekṣatva eva ca|
1377:107: asamā ca tadanyebhyaḥ so 'gre dhṛtimatāṃ yataḥ[mataḥ]||21||
1377:130: ābhyāṃ vastuto niśrayataḥ svabhāvataḥ prabhedataścākhedo nirdiṣṭaḥ|
1377:136: tābhyāṃ hi khedotpattito lajjayate na cotpādayati|
1377:148: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā cikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca|
1377:150: karma prathamavastuni svayaṃ pratipattiḥ parebhyaśca tatsamākhyānaṃ |
1377:155: lakṣaṇaṃ śāstrajñatāyā etānyeva pañca vastūni śrutāni bhavanti|
1377:165: sā punareṣā śāsrajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ samādhimukhairdhāraṇīmukhaiśca saṃgṛhītā|
1377:183: dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ lokasyodayaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāro yaścodayo yena ceti kṛtvā|
1377:188: śamāya prāptaye teṣāṃ dhīmān satyeṣu yujyate|
1377:196: tatra prāmāṇiko 'rtho yaḥ pramāṇabhūtena nīto vibhaktaḥ śāstrā vā tatpramāṇīkṛtena vā|
1377:202: prathame pratisaraṇe ārṣadharmapratikṣeptuḥ pudnalasya pratiṣedho deśitaḥ|
1377:215: paryāye lakṣaṇe vākye jñāne jñānācca tā matāḥ||34||
1377:218: tṛtīyā vākye pratyekaṃ janapadeṣu yā bhāṣāḥ|
1377:221: deśanāyāṃ prayuktasya yasya yena ca deśanā|
1377:226: deśanāyāṃ hi prayuktasya yasya ca deśanā yena ca|
1377:233: vākyena deśanā tayoreva dvayoḥ sarvathā prāpaṇāt|
1377:235: ato yacca yena ca deśyate tajjñānāt catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vyavasthāpitāḥ|
1377:238: etena pratisaṃvidāṃ nirvacanaṃ karma ca darśitaṃ|
1377:239: pratyātmaṃ lokottareṇa jñānena sarvadharmasamatāṃ tathatāmavetya uttarakālaṃ tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena jñānena pravedanā paryāyādīnāṃ pratisaṃviditi nirvacanaṃ|
1377:248: dānaṃ śīlaṃ ca puṇyasya prajñā jñānasya saṃbhṛtiḥ|
1377:253: punaḥ prajñāyāṃ pariṇāmanātsarvāḥ pañca pāramitā jñānasaṃbhāro veditavyaḥ|
1377:254: saṃtatyā bhāvanāmetya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi|
1377:255: āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vī[dhī]re sarvārthasādhakaḥ||40||
1377:287: kathaṃ prāptitaḥ kāyādīnāṃ na visaṃyogāya nāvisaṃyogāya|
1377:298: kathaṃ bhāvanātaḥ atyantaṃ tadbhāvanāt nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe 'pi tadakṣayāt|
1377:304: yāvatyaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā uktāḥ tadvipakṣāṇāṃ doṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvaneti samastaṃ samyakprahāṇalakṣaṇam|
1377:307: manaskārasya ca tyāge praveśe caiva bhūmiṣu||46||
1377:309: sattvānāṃ paripāke ca abhiṣeke ca dhīmatāṃ||47||
1377:310: kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca|
1377:324: ye ca vipakṣāsteṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvanā veditavyā|
1377:333: chandaṃ hi niśritya śamathavipaśyanākhyaṃ yogaṃ bhāvayatīti vyāyacchate|
1377:334: sā ca bhāvanā śamathapragrahopekṣānimittaiḥ saha bhāvyate|
1377:344: eṣā yogabhāvanā yathoktaprabhedeṣu sarvasamyakprahāṇeṣu pratipakṣa ucyate|
1377:361: aṣṭānāṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ chando vyāyāmaḥ śraddhā vyāvasāyikaḥ upāyaḥ|
1377:372: tatra darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ pañcavidhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ dīvyaṃ cakṣuḥ āryaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ dharmacakṣuḥ buddhacakṣuśca|
1377:374: tābhirupasaṃkramya bhāṣāṃ cittaṃ cāgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca viditvā niḥsaraṇāyāvavadanāt|
1377:375: sthitivikriḍitaṃ yasmāt bodhisattvānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ nirmāṇādibhiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaṃ|
1377:376: praṇidhiryena praṇidhijñānena praṇidhānabalikā bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanti|
1377:377: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya vā prabhāyā vā svarasya veti vistareṇa yathā daśabhūmike sūtre|
1377:378: vaśitā yathā tatraiva daśa vaśitā nirdiṣṭāḥ|
1377:397: etena yasyāmavasthāyāṃ yasyāvabodhāt bodhyaṅgāni vyavasthāpyante tadupadiṣṭaṃ|
1377:398: bhūmipraviṣṭāvasthāyāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca samatāvabodhādyathākramaṃ dharmanairātmyenātmaparasamatayā ca|
1377:410: tataḥ prītiḥ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ[yaṃ] sadā prīṇayati|
1377:419: upekṣocyate nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ tayā bodhisattvaḥ sarvatra yathākāmaṃ viharati|
1377:425: tatra ca gatvā vāsaṃ kalpayati yatrākhinnaḥ caturaṅgo bālakāyaḥ paraiti|
1377:437: yena yanniśritya yo 'saṃkleśa iti trividhamasaṃkleśāṅgaṃ veditavyam|
1377:445: tadvyavasthāne ca sūtrādike bhagavatā kṛte sa eva praveśastena tadarthāvabodhāt|
1377:448: pratipakṣasya bhāvanā samyagvyāyāmādayo yathākramaṃ jñeyāvaraṇasya mārgāvaraṇasya ca vaiśeṣikaguṇāvaraṇasya ca samyagvyāyāmena dīrghaṃ hi kālam akhidyamāno jñeyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati|
1377:450: samyaksamādhinā vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatyevamaṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante|
1377:455: dharmāṇāṃ ca pravicayādyathākramaṃ śamatho vipaśyanā ca veditavyā|
1377:458: sā ca śamathavipaśyanā sarvatragā yaṃ yaṃ guṇamākāṅkṣati tatra tatra tadbhāvanāt|
1377:460: ākāṅkṣedbhikṣuraho vatāhaṃ viviktaṃ kāmairiti vistareṇa yāvat tena bhikṣuṇā imāveva dvau dharmau bhāvayitavyau|
1377:469: ityupaniṣanmatetyevamādinā śamathavipaśyanāyāḥ prabhedaḥ karma ca nirdiṣṭaṃ|
1377:477: tadeva ca bhūmitrayaṃ niśritya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayitavyaṃ|
1377:488: kṣiprābhisaṃbodhe sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yāvad bhavatu me jñānaṃ saṃbodhāyeti pratideśanā 'numodanādhyeṣaṇā pariṇāmanā|
1377:492: asmin pañcavidha upāye sarvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāmasamaṃ tadanyaiḥ kauśalamityayaṃ prabhedaḥ|
1377:496: parīttā mahatī sā ca mahatī trividhā punaḥ||71||
1377:501: atrāpi prabhedaḥ karma ca dhāraṇyāḥ saṃdarśitaṃ|
1377:510: abhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ mṛdvī bhūmipraviṣṭānām aśuddhabhūmikānāṃ madhyā saptasu bhūmiṣu|
1377:511: pariśuddhabhūmikā tvadhimātrā śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu ityayaṃ prabhedo dhāraṇyāḥ|
1377:514: cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat|
1377:516: hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittātsadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat|
1377:520: atra praṇidhānaṃ svabhāvato nidānato bhūmitaḥ prabhedataḥ karmataśca paridīpitaṃ|
1377:524: tacca praṇidhānaṃ hetubhūtaṃ cittādeva sadyaḥ phalatvāt|
1377:525: āyatyāṃ vā[cā]bhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ cittātpunaḥ sadyaḥphalaṃ cittamātrāt yathābhipretārthasamṛddhitā[to]|
1377:528: yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya veti vistaraḥ|
1377:541: trividhaśca grāhyasya gocarasya grāhakā ye samādhayaḥ|
1377:542: te śūnyatādisamādhayaḥ iti grāhyagrāhakabhāvena trayaḥ samādhayo jñātavyāḥ|
1377:557: tatra sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhāḥ ityapraṇihitasya samādherūpaniṣadbhāvena deśitaṃ|
1377:567: evaśabdenāvadhāraṇaṃ parikalpita ātmā nāsti parikalpamātraṃ tvastīti parikalpitalakṣaṇasyābhāvārtho 'nātmārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati|
1377:575: tatra kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskṛtamiti paścādvacanadiyaṃ pratijñā veditavyā|
1377:580: atha kālāntaraṃ sthitvā pūrvottaranirodhotpādataḥ prabandheneṣyate vṛttiḥ|
1377:582: naiva cotpannasya vinā prabandhena kālāntaraṃ bhāvo yujyate|
1377:585: tadyadi bhūtvā punaruttarakālaṃ bhavati tasyāvaśyaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ|
1377:587: na ca tattenaiva hetunā bhavitumarhati tasyopayu[bhu]ktahetukatvāt|
1377:590: evaṃ vinā prabandhenotpannasya kālāntaraṃ bhāvo na yujyate|
1377:591: athāpyevamiṣyeta notpannaṃ punarutpadyate yadarthaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ syādutpannaṃ tu kālāntareṇa paścānnirudhyate notpannamātrameveti|
1377:602: māyopamāste bhikṣo saṃskārā āpāyikāstāvatkālikā itvarapratyupasthāyina iti|
1377:604: te hi saṃskārāṇāmudayavyayau manasikurvantaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyanti|
1377:605: anyathā hi teṣāmapi nirvidvirāgavimuktayo na syuryathānyeṣāṃ maraṇakālādiṣu nirodhaṃ paśyatāṃ|
1377:606: yadi cotpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kālāntaraṃ tiṣṭhet sa svayameva vā tiṣṭhetsvayameva sthātuṃ samarthaḥ|
1377:611: kena vā so 'nte punaḥ sthātuṃ na samarthaḥ|
1377:615: labdhe tu vināśakāraṇe paścādvinaśyati agnimeva śyāmateti|
1377:621: tathā hi tatsaṃbandhāt śyāmatāyāḥ saṃtatirvisadṛśī gṛhyate na tu sarvathaivāpravṛttiḥ|
1377:629: athāpi syātpratikṣaṇamapūrvotpattau tadevedamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ na syāditi|
1377:637: tadyadi nādita evārabdhaṃ bhavedādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānāmante pariṇāmo nopalabhyeta|
1377:638: tasmādādita evānyathātvamārabdhaṃ yatkrameṇābhivardhamānamante vyaktimāpadyate kṣīrasyeva dadyavasthāyāṃ|
1377:647: kṣaṇikaṃ hi cittaṃ prasiddhaṃ tasya cānye saṃskārāścakṣurūpādayo hetutaḥ|
1377:649: na tvakṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikaṃ bhavitumarhati yathā nityādanityamiti|
1377:653: cittena hi sarve saṃskārāścakṣurādayaḥ sādhiṣṭhānā upāttāḥ sahasaṃmurchanāḥ tadanugrahānuvṛttitaḥ|
1377:657: cittenāyaṃ loko nīyate cittena parikṛṣyate cittasyotpannasyotpannasya vaśe vartate iti|
1377:661: śuddhaṃ hi yogināṃ cittaṃ saṃskārā anuvartante|
1377:663: dhyāyī bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścittavaśe prāpta imaṃ dāruskandhaṃ sacet suvarṇamadhimucyate tadapyasya tathaiva syāditi|
1377:666: tathā hi pāpakāriṣu sattveṣu bāhyā bhāvā hīnā bhavanti|
1377:670: na hi kṣaṇikasyākṣaṇikaṃ phalaṃ yujyate tadanuvidhāyitvāt|
1377:671: evaṃ tāvadaviśeṣeṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ sādhitam|
1377:672: ādhyātmikānāṃ punaḥ sādhanārthaṃ pañca ślokā veditavyāḥ|
1377:694: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu paranirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ cittamātrādhīnatvāt|
1377:699: pratibimbatvena yo aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyināṃ samādhivaśena pratibimbānāṃ[khyānāṃ] saṃskārāṇāmutpādaḥ|
1377:700: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyāmutpattāvādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumānaviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇairveditavyam|
1377:702: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt taduttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtteruttarottaraviśeṣo nopalabhyeta hetvaviśeṣāt|
1377:706: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā 'nyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet|
1377:711: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ|
1377:713: na hi tiṣṭhatyāśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate|
1377:714: yāne tiṣṭhati tadārūḍhānavasthānavadanyathā hyāśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet|
1377:718: na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāvavināśe satyante vikārābhāvāt|
1377:719: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau|
1377:720: na hi tathāsthiteṣveva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syādutpattiḥ sugatau vā|
1377:726: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatirnāma kācit kriyā yujyate|
1377:727: sā hyutpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayedanutpannā vā|
1377:728: yadyutpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcidgata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate|
1377:729: athānutpannā tenāsatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate|
1377:730: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate|
1377:734: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārādanyopalabhyate|
1377:743: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyostiryaggamanamagnerūrdhvaṃ jvalanamapāṃ nimne syandanaṃ|
1377:748: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvamantareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasminkāle punarbījabhāvo yujyate|
1377:750: na ca śakyaṃ pūrvaṃ sabījatvaṃ carame kṣaṇe nirbījatvamabhyupagantuṃ|
1377:767: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍivadhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate|
1377:777: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle|
1377:784: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇamanyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt|
1377:787: na hi tejasyutpanne tejaḥ sahotpannamindhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate|
1377:788: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ|
1377:791: śabdaḥ punaryo 'pi kālāntaramupalabhyate ghaṇṭādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ|
1377:793: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddhameva cittānuvṛtteryathā pūrvamuktaṃ|
1377:795: pṛcchrayate khalvapi sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sidhyati kathaṃ kṛtvā|
1377:799: yadyevaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇamanya[nitya]tvasyāgrahaṇāditi sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ|
1377:806: dvividhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca|
1377:807: tadyadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyamabhipretamata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate|
1377:808: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaurvā goriti|
1377:809: atha vṛttivailakṣaṇyamata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpādīnāṃ prasiddhatvāt|
1377:814: cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tadāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate|
1377:815: yadyevaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avasthānamiti|
1377:817: na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatteriti|
1377:818: yadyevaṃ vadet sati kṣaṇikattve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmātpradīpādiva kṣaṇiakatvaṃ na siddhamiti|
1377:822: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāttadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punarvyavadānamityevaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ|
1377:824: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu|
1377:832: dvaye sati ca vijñānasaṃbhavātpratyayo na saḥ|
1377:843: ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca||101||
1377:847: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo'sti vā||103||
1377:849: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu|
1377:850: yataśca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ|
1377:854: na hi sa dravyata upalabhyate rūpādivat|
1377:856: na ca pudgalaṃ buddhyā na pratipadyante pudgalavādinaḥ|
1377:858: dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānamupalabhate prajñāpayatīti kathaṃ nopalabdho bhavati|
1377:859: na sa evamupalabhyamāno dravyata upalabdho bhavati|
1377:861: viparyāsāt tathā hyanātmanyātmeti viparyāsa ukto bhagavatā|
1377:865: satkāyadṛṣṭikleśalakṣaṇo hyeṣa saṃkleśo yaduta ahaṃ mameti|
1377:867: na[sa] caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ|
1377:870: yatra punarvastuni rūpādisaṃjñakeprajñaptiḥ pudgala iti tasmātkimekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvidanyetvena| āha|
1377:876: ekatve hi skandhānāmātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasattvaṃ|
1377:880: ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanamatikramya pudgalasya dravyato 'stitvamicchanti ta idaṃ syurvacanīyāḥ|
1377:889: ekatvenānyatvena ca agnirhi nāma tejodhāturindhanaṃ śeṣāṇi bhūtāni|
1377:891: loke ca vināpyagninā dṛṣṭamindhanaṃ kāṣṭhādi vināpi cendhanenāgniriti siddhamanyatvaṃ|
1377:894: upalabdhestathā hi vāyunā vikṣiptaṃ dūramapi jvalatparaiti|
1377:899: astyeva pudgalo ya eṣa draṣṭā yāvadvijñātā kartā bhoktā jñātā moktā ca|
1377:902: sa hi darśānādisaṃjñakānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayabhāvena vā kartā bhavet svāmitvena vā|
1377:907: na hi tasya tatra kiṃcitsāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ|
1377:909: sa hi vijñānapravṛttau svāmībhavannani[bhavanni]ṣṭaṃ vijñānamanityaṃ na pravartayet|
1377:930: api khalu pudgalo draṣṭā bhavan yāvadvijñātā darśanādiṣu saprayatno vā bhavenniṣprayatno vā|
1377:931: saprayatnasya vā punarasau prayatnaḥ svayaṃbhūrvā bhavedākasmikaḥ|
1377:937: niṣprayatnasya vā punaḥ sataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati|
1377:939: ityasati vyāpāre pudgalasya darśanādau kathamasau draṣṭā bhavati|
1377:944: yadi darśanādiṣu prayatna ākasmiko yato darśanādīni|
1377:945: na tarhi teṣāṃ pudgalaḥ karteti kathamasau draṣṭā bhavati yāvadvijñātā sati vākasmikatve nirapekṣatvāt na kadācitprayatno na syādanityo na syāt|
1377:946: nitye ca prayatne darśanādīnāṃ yugapacca nityaṃ ca pravṛttiḥ syāditi doṣaḥ|
1377:951: tasya tathā sthitasya pratyayatvaṃ na yujyate|
1377:953: sati hi tatpratyayatve na kadācitpudgalo nāstīti|
1377:954: kimarthaṃ prāk prayatno na syādyadā notpannaḥ|
1377:956: tṛtīyaśca kaścitpakṣo nāsti yanna sthito na vinaṣṭaḥ syāditi|
1377:960: ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca||
1377:961: dharmoddāneṣu hi bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti deśitaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyāmasti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhānpratisaṃdadhāti|
1377:966: śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate nādhimucyate|
1377:969: pudgalo 'pi hi bhagavatā tatra tatra deśitaḥ|
1377:970: parijñātāvī bhārahāraḥ śraddhānusāryādipudgalavyavasthānata ityasati dravyato 'stitve kasmāddeśitaḥ|
1377:974: pudgalaprajñaptimantareṇa tadvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaśca deśayituṃ na śakyaḥ|
1377:975: tatra parijñāsūtre parijñeyā dharmāḥ saṃkleśaḥ parijñā vyavadānaṃ|
1377:979: tayorvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaścāntareṇa parijñātāvibhārahārapudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ|
1377:981: teṣāṃ vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaścāntareṇa śraddhānusāryādipudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ|
1377:982: yenāsati dravyato 'stitve pudgalo deśita ityayamatra nayo veditavyaḥ|
1377:992: tathā hi sarveṣāṃ na dṛṣṭasatyānāmātmadarśanaṃ vidyate|
1377:994: na hi pūrvamātmānamanātmato gṛhītvā satyābhisamayakāle kaścidātmato gṛhṇāti|
1377:995: yathā duḥkhaṃ duḥkhataḥ pūrvamagṛhītvā paścādgṛhṇātīti yathāpūrvaṃ tathā paścādapi mokṣo na syāt|
1377:996: sati cātmanyavaśyamahaṃkāramamakārābhyāmātmatṛṣṇayā cānyaiśca tannidānaiḥ kleśairbhavitavyamiti ato 'pi mokṣo na syāt|
1377:1000: ātmārthaṃ ca na riñcanti parārthaṃ sādhayanti ca||104||
